### <div align="center">I'm Lopins, a full-time full-stack freelance developer 👨‍💻 working remotely since 2024 🚀</div>  
  
- 🔭 I’m currently working on [Github](https://github.com/lopins)  
  
- 🌱 I’m currently learning `Rust` and `Go`  
  
- ❓ Ask me about anything related to AI stack and related technologies  
  
- ⚡ Fun fact: I use tabs over spaces
